description:
From packing their first snowman, building the perfect snow fort, or just holding onto the sleigh, these waterproof and warm mitts will keep little hands cozy. Kombi has packed the Best Friend mitts with the same technologies you find on adult winter hand wear.

  • Durable, water-resistant and breathable lightweight shell
  • GORE-TEX® waterproof and breathable membrane
  • Primaloft® Gold series insulation that offers an incredible warmth to weight ratio, breathability and pack-ability
  • Red thumb-lining acts as a guide
  • Accu-Dri® wicking micro-polyester and wool lining is naturally antimicrobial
  • Long elastic cuff with a zipper makes it easy to help onto small hands
name: Kombi Best Friend Gore-Tex Mitts - Children
